org.simalliance.openmobileapi

Class PKCS15Provider.Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simalliance.openmobileapi.PKCS15Provider.Path
  • Enclosing class:
    PKCS15Provider

    public class PKCS15Provider.Path
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Path object as defined in chapter 6.1.5 of the PKCS#15 specification (v1.1).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int VALUE_UNDEFINED
      Undefined value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PKCS15Provider.Path(byte[] path)
      Builds a Path object without index and length (the path can be absolute as well as relative).
      PKCS15Provider.Path(byte[] path, int index, int length)
      Builds a Path object with index and length (the path can be absolute as well as relative).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] encode()
      Encodes this Path object according to DER (see ITU X.690 for DER-Coding).
      int getIndex()
      Returns the index field of this Path object.
      int getLength()
      Returns the length field of this Path object.
      byte[] getPath()
      Returns the path field of this Path object.
      boolean hasIndexLength()
      Checks whether this Path object has an index and length fields.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • VALUE_UNDEFINED

        public static final int VALUE_UNDEFINED
        Undefined value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • PKCS15Provider.Path

        public PKCS15Provider.Path(byte[] path)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Builds a Path object without index and length (the path can be absolute as well as relative).
        Parameters:
        path - the path as a byte array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is not correct.

      • PKCS15Provider.Path

        public PKCS15Provider.Path(byte[] path,
                   int index,
                   int length)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Builds a Path object with index and length (the path can be absolute as well as relative).
        Parameters:
        path - The path as a byte array.
        index - The index value.
        length - The length value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the path is not correct.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public byte[] getPath()
        Returns the path field of this Path object.
        Returns:
        The path field.

      • hasIndexLength

        public boolean hasIndexLength()
        Checks whether this Path object has an index and length fields.
        Returns:
        True if the index and length field is present, false otherwise.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Returns the index field of this Path object. The value of this field is undefined if the method hasIndexLength() returns false.
        Returns:
        The index field.

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Returns the length field of this Path object. The value of this field is undefined if the method hasIndexLength() returns false.
        Returns:
        The length field.

      • encode

        public byte[] encode()
        Encodes this Path object according to DER (see ITU X.690 for DER-Coding).
        Returns:
        This Path object as a DER-encoded byte array.
